mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BNO, BWRITER, BTITLE, BCONTENTS, BHITS, BDATE, BFILENAME, BSTATE) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(BNO), 0) + 1 AS BNO FROM BOARD), #{bwriter}, #{btitle}, #{bcontents}, #{bhits}, DEFAULT, #{bfilename,jdbcType=NULL}, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT BNO, BWRITER, BTITLE, BCONTENTS, BHITS, TO_CHAR(BDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BDATE, BFILENAME, BSTATE FROM BOARD WHERE BSTATE NOT IN('D') ORDER BY BNO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BHITS = BHITS + 1 WHERE BNO = #{bno}
UPDATE BOARD SET BTITLE = #{btitle}, BCONTENTS = #{bcontents}, BSTATE = 'M' WHERE BNO = ${bno}
UPDATE BOARD SET BSTATE = 'D' WHERE BNO = ${bno}
